Messuage.definition: a dwelling house with the adjacent buildings and curtilage and other adjoining lands used in connection with the household
Messuage.origin: [Anglo-French, probably alteration of Old French mesnage dwelling house, ultimately from Latin mansion- mansio habitation, dwelling, from manÄ“re to remain, sojourn, dwell]

1.1: a dwelling house with the adjacent buildings and curtilage and other adjoining lands used in connection with the household
